Package com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.projectiles

Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.AnimatedBoxGameObject
com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.projectiles.Projectile
com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.projectiles.Bomb
public class Bomb
extends Projectile
This class represents a simple bomb that can be fired by an enemy and travels to the lower side of the screen.
Author:
Yannic Wehner

  • Constructor Details

    • Bomb

      public Bomb​(float x, float y, float speed)
      Parameters:
      x - The x-position of the upper left corner of the laser in the Cartesian coordinate system.
      y - The y-position of the upper left corner of the laser in the Cartesian coordinate system.
      speed - The amount of pixels the laser moves with each call of the move method in a given direction.
